DOC.brief_title: Prediction Prevention Preeclampsia First Trimester Ultrasound
DOC.detailed_description: It show low dose acetylsalicylic acid ( ASA ) pregnancy reduces adverse outcome pregnancy woman high risk develop preeclampsia ( PE ) . It challenge clinician identify high risk woman . Doppler blood flow measurement uterine artery second trimester show useful predict development disease prophylactic treatment ASA point pregnancy proven effective . Fetal Medical Foundation develop algorithm calculates individual risk PE/ PIH base Doppler blood flow measurement anamnestic information .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant Nulliparous Para 1+ previous preeclampsia gestational hypertension last menstrual period ( LMP ) pregnancy length inclusion < 13 week Residence Trondheim + 8 surround municipality Pregnancy length > 13+6 week ( CRL > 85 mm ) Twins Missed abortion Fetal anomaly
